On 1/22/07, Nikunj Mehta <nrmehtais@...> wrote:
> I am trying to understand how strong entity tags are being generated for use with HTTP. Can anyone point to suitable resources or suggest options?

See my delicious links:

http://del.icio.us/alan.dean/etag

I use a hash of the entity for my etags.

Alan Dean
